local_intent: Move above the red_plate with 2 cm standoff and verify position.
assumptions: DetectObject provides a fresh pose for red_plate.
IsAt(red_plate) is sufficient to verify the above-target approach for transfer.
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer-phase step preceding placement: re-detect red_plate, move above it at 0.02 m, then confirm position, matching the GLOBAL_BT sequence.
